appDescription: is a free, open source, advanced, modern file manager app, licensed under GNU GPLv3 or later.
appCopyright: Copyright Â© 2021 - present Aleksey Hoffman. All rights reserved.
isCorrectedLanguage: Translation was reviewed and corrected by a native language speaker
isAutoTranslatedLanguage: Auto-translated. Needs to be reviewed and corrected by a native language speaker
toAddNewLanguage:
You can add a new language or edit existing language on the project page on Github.
See the instructions in the discussions

notes.trashedNotesDeletedAfter7days: Trashed notes are automatically deleted from the drive 7 days after being trashed

minimizeAppToTray.radioLabel: Minimize to tray and keep in memory (recommended)
minimizeAppToTray.description: When the app main window is closed, all features will remain active and trigger without a delay (features like global shortcuts, auto updating, etc).

closeMainWindow.radioLabel: Minimize to tray and minimize memory usage

description.title: When the app main window is closed:
description.subtitle1: The following features will remain active:
description.subtitle2: The following features will work with limitations. The app will take some time to load back into memory:
description.feature2: Global shortcuts: will trigger with a delay, the app will take some time to load.
description.subtitle3: The following features will not work:
description.feature3: Drive scan. Drives are scanned periodically to ensure features like global search can be used without a delay.

closeApp.description: When the app main window is closed, all features stop working

visualEffects.title: Visual effects
visualEffects.makeEffectLessProminentOnHomePage: Make effect less prominent on home page
visualEffects.useTheSameSettingsForAllPages: Use the same settings for all pages
visualEffects.previewEffectForSelectedPageTooltip: Disable after you finish customizing selected page to see the effects for "settings" page
visualEffects.pageToCustomizeDescription1: Select page from the list and adjust settings to save.
visualEffects.pageToCustomizeDescription2: The preview of the effect will be displayed on this page until you visit another page.

visualFilters.title: Visual filters
visualFilters.applyFiltersToMediaElements: Apply filters to media elements (images, videos)

homeBannerAnimation.title: Home banner animation
homeBannerAnimation.hint: Setting will apply on the next page change

uiElements.title: UI elements
uiElements.showUserNameOnHomeDirectoryCard: Show user name on 'home directory' card

infoPanel.title: Info panel
infoPanel.infoPanelIsLocated: Info panel is located on the navigator page.
infoPanel.itDisplaysLastItem: It displays information about the last selected item.
infoPanel.intensiveFeature: this is a computationally intensive feature, so it's recommended to turn it on only on computers with a powerful CPU and an SSD. It's also recommended to disable it on laptops, since it increases battery usage.
infoPanel.whenOpenDirectory: When you open or select a directory, the app will automatically calculate and display its full size.
infoPanel.oneSecond: For most directories it takes less than 1 second to calculate the size. If the operation takes longer than that, it will be canceled.

navigator.title: Navigator
navigator.showDividersBetweenFilesAndDirectories: Show dividers between files and directories
navigator.ifEnabledTheSelectedSortingType: If enabled, the selected sorting type will be applied after app reload
navigator.filesWithDisproportionatelyLongNames: files with disproportionately long names make the file list look messy, so it's recommended to set the name column max width to a lower value, like 50%, to make it look more organized

performance.theAppSystemMemoryRamUsage: The app system memory (RAM) usage will decrease significantly (will be offloaded to GPU memory)

workspaces.showWorkspaceTitle: Show workspace title in window toolbar

tabs.tabsBehaveAsPinnedDirectories: If enabled, tabs behave as pinned directories rather than traditional tabs
tabs.showStorageIndicator: Show storage indicator on navigator tab
tabs.closeAppWindow: Close app window when all current workspace tabs are closed

navigatorHistory.title: Navigator history
navigatorHistory.sigmaDefaultDescription: This custom Sigma history style allows you to get back to previously opened paths, even after inserting a new path into the history while navigating the history stack.
navigatorHistory.traditionalDescription: This is a traditional history style, used in vast majority of apps. It overwrites all succeding paths when you insert a new path anywhere other than the end, which means once you go back in history and open some other directory, all succedding entries will be gone.

example.ifYouNowGoBackToDirectory: If you now go back to directory
example.andThenGoBackAgainTo: and then go back again to
example.sigmaDefaultExampleDescription: you will still be able to go back in history to the previous directories by pressing "go back" or "go forward" button.
example.traditionalExampleDescription: you will NOT be able to go back in history to the previous directories by pressing "go back" or "go forward" button, because they were overwritten and the history now only has 2 directories:

input.buttonToSelectWithoutOpening: button to select the item without opening it
input.activateWhenDirectoryChanges: Activate item filtering when directory changes
input.valueRangeFrom200To1000ms': The value should be in range 200 - 1000 (ms)

globalSearch.title: Global search
globalSearch.enableGlobalSearch: Enable global search feature and periodic search data scans
globalSearch.higherDepthScansWillIncrease: Higher depth scans will increase both the scan and the search time, but will allow you to find files located in more deeply nested directories.
globalSearch.compressionReduces: Compression significantly reduces the amount of space needed for search data (up to 20 times less) but search scans take longer (~2 times).
globalSearch.enterPathToAddToIgnored: Enter a path to add to the ignored list and press
globalSearch.dependsOnFileLocation: (per 1 TB drive per search word) | depends on file location

drives.focusAppWhenDriveConnected: Focus the app when a drive is connected

data.everyTimeYouOpenDirectory: Every time you open a directory, the app generates a small thumbnail for every image and stores it in the app drectory. This image caching technique improves app performance. When the specified limit is reached, all thumbnails are deleted.

stats.storeSomeEventData: If enabled, the app will store some event data of your interactions with directories / files, for example, when and how many times they were opened.
stats.thisDataIsUsed: This data is used by features like "timeline" and "search".
stats.storeOpenedDirectoryItems: Store the list of opened directory items
stats.storeAmountDirectoryItemWasOpened: Store the amount of times a directory item was opened
stats.storeTheDateOpeningDirectoryItem: Store the date of opening a directory item
stats.statisticsLocationDescription: The statistics data is stored in the file called "stats.json" located in the app directory.

dataBackupReminder.title: Reminder: data backup
dataBackupReminder.description: It's recommended to regularly backup (copy) all your important files to an external drive (which is not connected to your most of the time), so if something goes wrong, you don't lose important files.
dataBackupReminder.autoBackupWillBeAdded: The auto-backup feature will be added in one of the next versions of the app

allowGlobalSearchMessage:
Global search lets you quickly find any file / directory on your computer.
It periodically scans your drives and generates data files (maps) so it can find your files quickly.
The files that were created after the last scan will not be found since they won't be in the data files, so it's recommended to choose a more frequent auto scan period.

shortcuts.openTheAppWindowCreateANewNote: Open the app window & create a new note
shortcuts.closeOpenedDialogOverlay: Close opened dialog / overlay; dismiss items prepared for copying or moving, deselect items
shortcuts.openCloseSelectedFileInQuickView: Open / close selected file in Quick View window. Supported: images, videos, audio, PDF, plain text
shortcuts.closeCurrentTab: Close current tab / close app window
shortcuts.closeAllTabsInCurrentWorkspace: Close all tabs in current workspace / close app window
shortcuts.copyCurrentDirectoryPathToClipboard: Copy current directory path to clipboard
shortcuts.openCurrentDirInTerminalAsAdmin: Open current dir in terminal as admin
shortcuts.createNewDirectoryInTheCurrentDirectory: Create new directory in the current directory
shortcuts.createNewFileInCurrentDirectory: Create new file in current directory
shortcuts.selectDirectoryItemInTheDirectionUp: Select directory item in the direction: up
shortcuts.selectDirectoryItemInTheDirectionLeft: Select directory item in the direction: left
shortcuts.selectDirectoryItemInTheDirectionDown: Select directory item in the direction: down
shortcuts.selectDirectoryItemInTheDirectionRight: Select directory item in the direction: right
shortcuts.goToPreviousDirectoryInHistory: Go to previous directory in history
shortcuts.goToNextDirectoryInHistory: Go to next directory in history
shortcuts.selectDeselectItemInTheCurrentDirectory: Select / deselect item in the current directory
shortcuts.selectDeselectItemRangeInTheCurrentDirec: Select / deselect item range in the current directory
shortcuts.selectAllItemsInCurrentDirectory: Select all items in current directory
shortcuts.setSelectedItemsForCopying: Set selected items for copying (replaces current list)
shortcuts.addSelectedItemsForCopying: Add selected items for copying. Allows to copy items from multiple directories at once
shortcuts.addSelectedItemsForMoving: Add selected items for moving. Allows to move items from multiple directories at once
shortcuts.transferPreparedForCopying: Transfer prepared for copying / moving items to current directory
shortcuts.displaySystemEmojiAndSymbolPicker: Display system emoji and symbol picker
shortcuts.displaySystemClipboard: Display system clipboard (must be turned on in system settings)
